verses.verse: But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing: for <S%H5912>Achan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing: and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> from <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5973>beside<s%> <S%H1007>Bethaven,<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up and <S%H7270>view<s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%> And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H7270>viewed<s%> <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Let not <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up; but let about two <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H5217>smite<s%> <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> and make not <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3021>labor<s%> <S%H8033>thither;<s%> for they are but <S%H4592>few.<s%>

So there <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H8033>thither<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> of them about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> for they <S%H7291>chased<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> even to <S%H7671>Shebarim,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them in the <S%H4174>going<s%> <S%H4174>down:<s%> why the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4549>melted,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>eventide,<s%> he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5927>put<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Alas,<s%> O <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H3069>God,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> have you at all <S%H5674>brought<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> us? <S%H3863>would<s%> to God we had been <S%H2974>content,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan!<s%>
O <S%H136>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6310>when<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2015>turns<s%> their <S%H6203>backs<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies!<s%>

For the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of it, and shall <S%H5437>environ<s%> us <S%H5921>round,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> off our <S%H8034>name<s%> from the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> to your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name?<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H6965>Get<s%> you up; <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H5307>lie<s%> you <S%H2088>thus<s%> on your <S%H6440>face?<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and they have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them: for they have <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3947>taken<s%> of the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing, and have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1589>stolen,<s%> and <S%H3584>dissembled<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and they have <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H1571>even<s%> among their own <S%H3627>stuff.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> but <S%H6437>turned<s%> their <S%H6203>backs<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H2764>accursed:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I be with you any <S%H3254>more,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> <S%H3808><s%> you <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

Up, <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves against to <S%H4279>morrow:<s%> for <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> There is an <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you, O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> you <S%H3201>can<s%> not <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H5493>take<s%> away the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> therefore you shall be <S%H7126>brought<s%> according to your <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> and it shall be, that the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3920>takes<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> according to the <S%H4940>families<s%> thereof; and the <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3920>take<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> by <S%H1004>households;<s%> and the <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3920>take<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man.<s%>

And it shall be, that he that is <S%H3920>taken<s%> with the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has: <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their <S%H7626>tribes;<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was <S%H3920>taken:<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and he <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites:<s%> and he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man;<s%> and <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%> was <S%H3920>taken:<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man;<s%> and <S%H5912>Achan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> was <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5912>Achan,<s%> My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7760>give,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H3519>glory<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H8426>confession<s%> to him; and <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> you have <S%H6213>done;<s%> <S%H3582>hide<s%> it not from me.

And <S%H5912>Achan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H546>Indeed<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H2063>thus<s%> and <S%H2063>thus<s%> have I <S%H6213>done:<s%>

When I <S%H7200>saw<s%> among the <S%H7998>spoils<s%> a <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H8152>Babylonish<s%> <S%H155>garment,<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and a <S%H3956>wedge<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> <S%H4948>weight,<s%> then I <S%H2530>coveted<s%> them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> them; and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H2934>hid<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H168>tent,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> and they <S%H7323>ran<s%> to the <S%H168>tent;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H2934>hid<s%> in his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> them out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3332>laid<s%> them out <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H155>garment,<s%> and the <S%H3956>wedge<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and his <S%H7794>oxen,<s%> and his <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and his <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had: and they <S%H5927>brought<s%> them to the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H5916>troubled<s%> us? the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5916>trouble<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5619>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them with <S%H784>fire,<s%> after they had <S%H7275>stoned<s%> them with <S%H68>stones.<s%>

And they <S%H6965>raised<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger.<s%> <S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called,<s%> The <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor,<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
